title: Build yourself a world H.S.
creator_credit: Richard Need, John R.F. Stewart and Stewart's Films
brief_description: Traces the evolution of civil engineering, from man’s first tools to the structures of today. Shows that the present day civil engineer designs his project not only as a functional structure but also to take its place in its surroundings
creator_credit_for_label: Richard Need, John R.F. Stewart and Stewart’s Films
